author: dapplion
content: Reviewing our peer discovery strategy to join the required subnets, I'm incentivized to stay connect only to nodes already subscribed to many (or all) subnets at once. This tend to be big nodes supporting many validators, while smaller nodes that may be only subscribed at 2 subnets at once should be dropped eventually. What strategy do other teams use to prioritize peers in order to propagate attestations in time?
